More snow to hit Eastern Massachusetts this weekend

The forecast this weekend will make today’s clear skies and mild temperatures a thing of the past, the National Weather Service said. (Boston.com, 1:13 p.m.)

Meteor in Russia injures nearly 1,000

Nearly 1,000 people have sought medical treatment in blasts from shock waves caused by a meteor streaking over Russia's Ural Mountains. (10:54 a.m.)

Gunman disarmed in road rage incident

A driver in Newton defused a road-rage incident with some calm talk and martial arts skills, disarming the other driver who had a gun, police said. (9:14 a.m.)

An employee of a Back Bay supermarket acted in self-defense when he stabbed a customer Thursday night, the employee’s attorney said today. (1:45 p.m.)
